text:
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
Waste is defined in Annex II Glossary of Acronyms and Terms as ‘Any substance or object which
the holder discards or intends or is required to discard.’ This definition refers to Article 3(1) of
Directive 2008/98/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 19 November 2008 on
waste and repealing certain Directives (Waste Framework Directive or WFD).
